name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Integration Engineer with expertise in **Python**, **Node.js**, and **GCP** for developing and integrating scalable systems. Proficient in designing robust solutions that enhance system interoperability and streamline operational workflows. Adept at leveraging **IMS** for efficient data management, ensuring seamless integration across various platforms. Highly skilled in conveying complex technical concepts in **English** to diverse audiences. Proven ability to drive improvements across healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors through automation and efficient architecture design.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented integration solutions using **Python** and **Node.js** to enhance system communication and data exchange.
Leveraged **GCP** (Google Cloud Platform) services to improve deployment scalability and reliability, achieving a system uptime of **99.9%**.
Streamlined the integration process of various systems using **IMS** (Integration Management System), ensuring smooth data transfer.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and execute integration workflows, enhancing data accuracy by **40%**.
Conducted thorough testing and debugging of integration solutions, improving overall system performance and reliability.
Facilitated technical documentation and training sessions, ensuring effective knowledge transfer and understanding of integration systems.
Maintained fluency in **English**, fostering clear communication with diverse teams and stakeholders.

• Developed and maintained integration solutions utilizing **Python** and **Node.js**, enhancing system interoperability by 30%.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to streamline services on **GCP**, resulting in a 40% reduction in deployment time.
• Implemented Infrastructure Management Systems (IMS) to monitor and optimize cloud resources, achieving a 25% cost savings.
• Designed and executed test strategies, using **Python** to automate tests, increasing test coverage to 95%.
• Enhanced documentation and communication in English, ensuring clarity in technical specifications and integration processes for stakeholders.

Implemented integration solutions using **Python** and **Node.js** to facilitate seamless data exchange and improve system interoperability.
Utilized **GCP** services, achieving a cloud infrastructure efficiency improvement of **25%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance the Integration Management System (IMS), improving process efficiency by **15%**.
Developed integration scripts and automated workflows to ensure system accuracy and reliability, maintaining a system uptime of **99%**.
Documented integration processes and provided technical support in **English** to ensure clear communication and user understanding.

skills:
